            <string language="it">Lente d'ingrandimento</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergrößerungsglas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Loupe</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Perchè le cose sembrano più grandi attraverso una lente d'ingrandimento? Scoprilo...</string>
            <string language="en">Why does things look bigger through a magnifying glass? Find out....</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum der Sacheblick, der durch ein 
Vergrößerungsglas grösser ist? Finden Sie.... heraus</string>
          </description>

loupe ? Découvrez....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que  o olhar das coisas mais grande através de
um vidro ampliando? Encontre para fora....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί τα πράγματα φαίνονται μεγαλύτερα μέσω ενός 
ενισχύοντας γυαλιού; Ανακαλύψτε ....</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué  la mirada de las cosas más grande a 
través de una lupa? Descubra....</string>
          </description>
